member.name: SmoothingMode
member.summary: The SmoothingMode enumeration specifies the type of smoothing (antialiasing) that is applied to lines and curves. This enumeration is used by the and methods of theGraphics class.

member.name: SmoothingMode.SmoothingModeDefault
member.summary: Specifies that smoothing is not applied.

member.name: SmoothingMode.SmoothingModeHighSpeed
member.summary: Specifies that smoothing is not applied.

member.name: SmoothingMode.SmoothingModeHighQuality
member.summary: Specifies that smoothing is applied using an 8 X 4 box filter.

member.name: SmoothingMode.SmoothingModeNone
member.summary: Specifies that smoothing is not applied.

member.name: SmoothingMode.SmoothingModeAntiAlias
member.summary: Specifies that smoothing is applied using an 8 X 4 box filter.

member.name: SmoothingMode.SmoothingModeAntiAlias8x4
member.summary: Specifies that smoothing is applied using an 8 X 4 box filter.

member.name: SmoothingMode.SmoothingModeAntiAlias8x8
member.summary: Specifies that smoothing is applied using an 8 X 8 box filter.
